```r
library(fitAutoReg)
set.seed(42)
```


```r
data <- dat_p2_exo$data
exo_mat <- dat_p2_exo$exo_mat
```

## Residual bootstrap


```r
system.time(
  rb <- RBootVARExoOLS(
    data = data,
    exo_mat = exo_mat,
    p = 2,
    B = 5000L
  )
)
#>    user  system elapsed 
#>   1.626   0.629   1.148
rb$est
#>           [,1]        [,2]       [,3]         [,4]         [,5]        [,6]
#> [1,] 1.1645442  0.35802166 0.03734862 0.0002366562  0.106855984 -0.02817869

```

```r
system.time(
  rb <- RBootVARLasso(
    data = data,
    exo_mat = exo_mat,
    p = 2,
    B = 5000L,
    n_lambdas = 100,
    crit = "ebic",
    max_iter = 1000,
    tol = 1e-5
  )
)
#> Error in RBootVARLasso(data = data, exo_mat = exo_mat, p = 2, B = 5000L, : unused argument (exo_mat = exo_mat)
```
